mapper.update:
update contract
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
designer_id = #{designerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
decoration_company_id = #{decorationCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_number = #{contractNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signing_time = #{signingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
validity_of_contract = #{validityOfContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
due_time = #{dueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content_of_contract = #{contentOfContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplementary_contents_of_the_contract = #{supplementaryContentsOfTheContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update contract set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, designer_id = #{designerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, decoration_company_id = #{decorationCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_number = #{contractNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signing_time = #{signingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, validity_of_contract = #{validityOfContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, due_time = #{dueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content_of_contract = #{contentOfContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplementary_contents_of_the_contract = #{supplementaryContentsOfTheContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from contract where contract_status in('进行中','异常终止') limit ${from},${pageSize};
select count(*) from contract where contract_status in('进行中','异常终止')
